thread.title: Chelsea to face Tottenham on Saturday April 22 in FA Cup semi-final with Arsenal taking on Man City a day later
thread.title_full: Chelsea to face Tottenham on Saturday April 22 in FA Cup semi-final with Arsenal taking on Man City a day later

author: James Whaling
title: Chelsea to face Tottenham on Saturday April 22 in FA Cup semi-final with Arsenal taking on Man City a day later
text:
The semi-final fixtures have been confirmed (Photo: Michael Regan - The FA) Share Get football updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Chelsea will face Tottenham in the first game of this year's FA Cup semi-finals on Saturday April 22. 
The London derby will kick off the weekend of action with Arsenal facing Manchester City a day later. 
Spurs' clash with rivals Chelsea will begin at 17.30 and will be broadcast live on the BBC. 
Arsenal vs Manchester City will get underway at 3pm on Sunday and will be shown live on BT Sport. 
The four sides booked their place in the last four to complete an all-star lineup ahead of both fixtures which will each take place at Wembley. Arsenal beat non-league Lincoln 5-0 (Photo: Arsenal FC) Tottenham beat Millwall 6-0 (Photo: Ian Walton) Read More Aitor Karanka "sacrificed himself" claims Middlesbrough chairman Steve Gibson as strugglers search for new boss 
Chelsea overcame Manchester United at Stamford Bridge on Monday, with N'Golo Kante's strike proving the difference. 
Spurs thumped Millwall 6-0 at the Lane, while north London rivals Arsenal also cruised through by hitting non-league Lincoln for five at the Emirates. 
City steered their way past Middlesbrough 2-0 at the Riverside in what turned out to be Boro boss Aitor Karanka's final games in charge of the Teessiders. poll loading Who will win the FA Cup? 1000+ VOTES SO FAR
